channel.title: Not sure if this means its compiled or not
channel.description:
i clicked edit on my compiler and added this:
[code]@echo off COLOR 04 title [put your server name here] compiler echo ------------------------- echo Files Being Compiled... echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls COLOR 02 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo Files Compiled echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pause[/code]
when i compile it says:
'files being compiled.
the system cannot find the path specifed press any key to continue.'
then it goes to a different screen and says
'files compiled
press any key to continue'.
does that mean its compiled??

item.title: Not sure if this means its compiled or not
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

yes, i downloaded the newest jdk and changed my enviroment variables to the jdk i downloaded (6 update 11).

Read full topic
item.source: Not sure if this means its compiled or not

item.title: Not sure if this means its compiled or not
item.dc:creator: @Bevis Bevis
item.description:
@Bevis wrote:

[quote=“Rump Ranger93, post:2, topic:257958”]see where is says jdk1.6.0_11 whatever jdk you have or what update you have needs to go there.

ex:

should be in C:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_3

the folder name is the update of java you have…[/quote]

A.K.A
Change your path
